title: ** Login Functionality
preconditions: User is on the login page at https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
User has a valid username and password
main_flow: User enters valid username (tomsmith) in the input field.
User enters valid password (SuperSecretPassword!) in the input field.
5. System verifies the entered credentials against the database.
6. System finds the matching user account (tomsmith).
7. System grants access to the secure area and displays the success message.
a. User enters an incorrect username or password.
b. System does not find a matching user account.
c. System displays an error message "Invalid credentials. Please try again."
a. User leaves the username or password field empty.
b. System displays an error message "Username and password are required fields."
postconditions: User is logged in to the secure area.
System displays the success message "You are now logged in."
User can navigate to other pages within the secure area.
4. User can logout from the secure area when desired.
